short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash your inner actor with charades: a fun game for you and your friends.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ready to put your acting skills to the test? Step into the world of Charades: Kabuki, the thrilling game that will challenge your creativity and improvisation. Gather your friends and let the charades begin!

This is not just a game, it's a party starter, an icebreaker, a boredom buster right in your browser! 

Choose from four fabulous categories and dive into a pool of more than 100 thrilling questions. Dare to break the routine and unleash the fun with Kabuki.

Add it to your Chrome now and let the good times roll!
